title: Manage conflict
description: Interpret the source and stage of the conflict and recommend appropriate resolution solutions.

title: Lead a team
description: Set a clear vision and mission, support diversity and inclusion, and determine appropriate leadership style.

title: Support team performance
description: Appraise team member performance against KPIs and provide feedback to verify improvements.

title: Empower team members and stakeholders
description: Organize around team strengths, support accountability, and evaluate demonstration of task accountability.

title: Ensure team members/stakeholders are trained
description: Determine required competencies, allocate resources for training, and measure training outcomes.

title: Build a team
description: Appraise stakeholder skills, deduce project resource requirements, and continuously assess team knowledge transfer.

title: Address and remove impediments, obstacles, and blockers
description: Determine critical impediments for the team and prioritize solutions to remove them.

title: Negotiate project agreements
description: Analyze the bounds of negotiations for agreements and determine the ultimate objective.

title: Collaborate with stakeholders
description: Evaluate engagement needs, optimize alignment between stakeholder needs and project objectives, and build trust.

title: Build shared understanding
description: Break down the situation to identify the root cause of a misunderstanding and survey parties to reach consensus.

title: Engage and support virtual teams
description: Examine virtual team member needs (environment, geography, culture) and implement options for engagement.

title: Define team ground rules
description: Communicate organizational principles and establish an environment that fosters adherence to ground rules.

title: Mentor relevant stakeholders
description: Allocate time to mentoring and recognize and act on mentoring opportunities.

title: Promote team performance through emotional intelligence
description: Assess behavior through the use of personality indicators and adjust to the emotional needs of key stakeholders.

title: Execute project with urgency
description: Assess opportunities to deliver value incrementally and support the team to subdivide tasks to find the Minimum Viable Product.

title: Manage communications
description: Analyze communication needs of all stakeholders and determine communication methods, channels, and frequency.

title: Assess and manage risks
description: Determine risk management options and iteratively assess and prioritize risks.

title: Engage stakeholders
description: Analyze stakeholders (power, interest, influence) and categorize them to manage expectations.

title: Plan and manage budget and resources
description: Estimate budgetary needs based on project scope and monitor budget variations and governance.

title: Plan and manage schedule
description: Estimate project tasks (milestones, dependencies, story points) and coordinate with other projects and operations.

title: Plan and manage quality of products/deliverables
description: Determine quality standards required for project deliverables and recommend options for improvement.

title: Plan and manage scope
description: Determine and prioritize requirements, break down scope (WBS, backlog), and monitor scope creep.

title: Integrate project planning activities
description: Consolidate project/phase plans, assess dependencies, and analyze data to make informed project decisions.

title: Manage project changes
description: Anticipate and embrace the need for change (e.g., follow change management practices) and determine strategy to handle changes.

title: Plan and manage procurement
description: Define resource requirements and needs, communicate resource requirements, and manage suppliers/contracts.

title: Manage project artifacts
description: Determine the requirements (what, when, where, who) for managing project artifacts and ensure they are accessible.

title: Determine appropriate project methods
description: Assess project needs, complexity, and magnitude to recommend appropriate execution strategy (Predictive, Agile, Hybrid).

title: Establish project governance structure
description: Determine appropriate governance for a project (e.g., replicate organizational governance) and define escalation paths.

title: Manage project issues
description: Recognize when a risk becomes an issue and attack the issue with the optimal action to achieve project success.

title: Ensure knowledge transfer for project continuity
description: Discuss project responsibilities within the team and outline expectations for the working environment.

title: Plan and manage project/phase closure or transitions
description: Determine criteria to successfully close the project or phase and validate readiness for transition.

title: Plan and manage project compliance
description: Confirm project compliance requirements (e.g., security, health and safety, regulatory) and classify potential threats.

title: Evaluate and deliver project benefits and value
description: Investigate that benefits are identified and document agreement on ownership for ongoing benefit realization.

title: Evaluate external business environment changes
description: Survey external business environment changes (e.g., regulations, technology, geopolitical) and recommend options for scope/backlog changes.

title: Support organizational change
description: Assess organizational culture and evaluate the impact of organizational change to project and vice versa.
